text: The Red Hooves are a [[minotaur]] clan of [[Droaam]]. They worship "He Who Walks Behind," an interpretation of the [[Horned King|Tol Kharash]] who resembles the [[Mockery]] in many respects. The Red Hooves prefer sly ambushes to the howling assaults of the [[Blood Horns]]. They also focus on the use of terror and in deceiving their enemies.
title: Red Hooves
